description: Show job production plan safety risks suggestion details.
permissions: Access is delegated to the related job production plan. A user may view a suggestion if they can access the associated job production plan per JobProductionPlanPolicy (e.g., admin; customer manager/operations with visibility; broker member; assigned planner/project manager; time card approver or subscriber; or assigned laborer/notifying crew).
validation_notes: The suggestion id argument is required and must be non-empty.
